A $100 fine will occur if you put trash out early.  DO NOT have any mail or packages shipped to you while you are staying. Please realize that you are in an apartment and need to be very considerate of the people who live in the units around you.  Beacon Hill is a quiet, professional neighborhood with working people.  Please respect that they do not appreciate loud neighbors. Keep the noise level to a minimum. Do NOT play loud music.  Try not to make too much noise after 10pm, and please do not bring any other guests who are not on the reservation back to the apartment unless you truly trust them.  We realize we cannot stop people from bringing back a "friend" but remember
